attributes.action: Remove Gary Linekar from working at the BBC
attributes.additional_details: all he cares about is who can come and play football for him to interview on BBC programme Match of the Day.  He has no right to call the people who pay his wages xenophobic
attributes.background: He is using his power of influence given to him by Television license payers to call a nation stupid and xenophobic for taking part in a display of democracy.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the BBC and not the UK Government or Parliament. In any case, we cannot accept petitions that call for someone to be given or lose their job.
